ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] Improve Heritrix 3.1.0 with joomla component
ygData.msgSnippet: You may want to consider writing a custom extractor that looks for something in the response to queue the supplied links. There are also some regex extractors

Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset=windows-1252

You may want to consider writing a custom extractor that looks for somethin=
g in the response to queue the supplied links. There are also some regex ex=
tractors available already that may be able to do whatever custom parsing y=
ou need. The ExtractorMultipleRegex class may be a good place to start.

I =
hope that helps.

~Adam

n next day my component returns the changed pages as http://www.example.com=

)

>
